title: Single Of The Week: The Mountain Goats – Damn These Vampires
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/mountaingoats-900x599.jpg "mountaingoats")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/4886-single-of-the-week-the-mountain-goats-damn-these-vampires/attachment/mountaingoats)

With the new **Mountain Goats** LP ‘_All Eternals Deck_’ now streaming on **NPR Music** it seems like the perfect time to have an extract from the record as our single of the week. The first release from the album ‘_Damn these vampires_’ is heavy on story and seems to have peaked interest in a band that although releasing a lot of albums has so far failed to receive the attention they deserve. Check out the tune below and stream the album if you’re feeling freaky. You’re feeling freaky right?

 [The Mountain Goats – Damn These Vampires](http://soundcloud.com/indiespot/the-mountain-goats-damn-these-vampires) by [Indiespot](http://soundcloud.com/indiespot)  
[](http://www.npr.org/2011/02/27/134056034/first-listen-the-mountain-goats-all-eternals-deck)

[Stream the album here](http://www.npr.org/2011/02/27/134056034/first-listen-the-mountain-goats-all-eternals-deck)
